content:
thus has the rights that any person has. It is generally acknowl-
edged in our society that babies are persons and therefore have the rights of
persons. By referring to the fetus as an unborn baby (or simply as a baby), a
point that demands argument is taken for granted without argument. That
counts  as  begging  the  question.  Of  course,  many  opponents  of  abortion
argue for the claim that a human fetus has the moral status of a person and
thus do not beg this central question in the debat
